homePage.homeText3: We created this app to help all fellow Japanese learners on their path to fluency.
homePage.homeText4: Learning Japanese might be difficult and monotonous, but in this place we'll speed up a little and have fun... unless you prefer slower pace, then don't worry - everything can be customized. If you wish to read and write like a master, then check out our Typer tool! It'll help you learn to connect kana with its way of reading.
homePage.homeText5: You don't need to track your own progress, the app will adjust to you and cover all basic information in the Progress tab.
homePage.homeText6: Hopefully you'll have a good time learning Japanese and stick with us!

helpDetails.helpDesc: Here you will find translations, a tutorial, and a link to Github Issues.
helpDetails.linkIssue: Create an issue if you spotted any bugs or mistakes, if you are having trouble or just when you want ot get in contact with us. ☺
helpDetails.writeLink: Feel free to share your thoughts
helpDetails.helpHiraDesc: one of the two Japanese syllabaries, mainly used for writing grammar (e.g., particles) and native words for which there is no kanji equivalent,
helpDetails.helpKataDesc: the second Japanese syllabary, mainly used for writing loanwords, onomatopoeias, proper names (e.g., foreign names), and technical terms,
helpDetails.helpGojuonDesc: a set of basic characters and their sounds for both kana alphabets,
helpDetails.helpDakutenDesc: marked with the symbol [ ゛]; a mark that changes a consonant to its voiced form; e.g., が,
helpDetails.helpHandakutenDesc: marked with the symbol [ ゜]; a mark that changes a consonant to its semi-voiced form; e.g., ぱ,
helpDetails.helpKanjiDesc: logographic characters of Chinese origin used in the Japanese language. Each kanji carries a specific meaning and often has multiple possible pronunciations depending on the context,
helpDetails.helpRomajiDesc: a system of transcribing Japanese sounds using the Latin alphabet. It is primarily used for learning the language by foreigners and to facilitate writing in international contexts,
helpDetails.helpFuriganaDesc: a rendering of a word in simpler kana, displayed above or next to a word. It serves as an aid for reading harder or less familiar words (usually written in kanji).
helpDetails.helpTutorial2: Select a mode from the navigation on the left side.
helpDetails.helpTutorial3: Using the settings under the 'Start' button, you can adjust the tool's functionality.
helpDetails.helpTutorial5: Type the sounds of the given characters - if you're a beginner, hints will be displayed above.
helpDetails.helpTutorial6: After finishing a session, you can repeat the selected mode, try a new one, or check your progress on the Progress page.
